longBusinessSummary: Hitachi, Ltd. provides digital system and services, green energy and mobility, and connective industry solutions in Japan and internationally. It operates through Digital Systems & Services, Green Energy & Mobility, Connective Industries, Automotive System, and others segments. The company offers system integration, consulting, cloud services, storage, servers, software, and ATMs; finance solutions, social infrastructure information systems, public IT solutions, IoT/data utilization, control system, and cloud services; and IT products. It also provides power grids, clean, nuclear, renewable energy, and railway systems, such as urban railway signal and traffic control system, signaling and traffic control systems, freight rail signaling and traffic control system, ticketing and fare collection systems, and digital asset management; and elevators and escalators, home appliances, air conditioners, industry and distribution solution, water and environment solutions, and industrial machinery. In addition, the company offers semiconductor manufacturing equipment, clinical analyzers, and Electron and probe microscope; powertrains, chassis, advanced driver assistance, and motorcycle systems; and property management and other services. Hitachi, Ltd. was founded in 1910 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
